text: Bernardino Cano Radil (29 November 1955 – 12 September 2021) was a Paraguayan politician. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1989 until 1998. He was an Ambassador to Cuba from 2015 until his death. He was born in Asunción, Paraguay. Cano Randil died on 12 September 2021 in Havana, Cuba from COVID-19, aged 65. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Ambassadors Category:Paraguayan politicians Category:People from Asunción Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Cuba
title: Bernardino Cano Radil
